strapiPost.title: Cheap Date
strapiPost.content:
Grandma always told you to stretch your dollar. According to Assemble, NWA ranks as 9th in the nation amongst cities where your dollar goes the furthest, so you're making grandma proud by living here.

  • High earners: While NWA landed in the middle of the top 15 taking into account income and cost of living, the region topped this list in per capita income - 20% higher than the next highest on the list!
  • Did you know? Our home region "boasts seven times the national average of headquarters and management employees".

If you want to learn more about this list, you can find it HERE.
